alert.note: Alert for Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Martin; Inland St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 11 at 6:03PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Martin and St. Lucie Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 602 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles west of J And S Fish Camp to 7 miles southwest of Indiantown to North County Airport. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port Saint Lucie, Walton, Fort Pierce, Stuart, and Indiantown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Martin; Inland St. Lucie
